body_content.explanation: involving a lot of competition, or more competition than normal:
examples: The car industry is super competitive and highly efficient.
These people are less able to adapt to the super-competitive atmosphere in the office.

body_content.explanation: wanting very much to win or be more successful than other people:
examples: I have always been super competitive.
The industry is full of supercompetitive young men who put a lot of energy into their work.

body_content.explanation: Super-competitive prices, services, etc. are much better than other prices, services, etc.:
examples: Can the automobile industry keep setting super-competitive prices?
The country's currency is artificially cheap, making its exports supercompetitive.
